content: तृद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> (तर्दति, तृणत्ति, तृंत्ते, तृण्ण) {@--1@} To cleave, split, pierce. {@--2@} To kill, destroy, annihilate; <ls>Bk. 6. 38</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 13</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 14.">108</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 36</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 15.">44.</ls> {@--3@} To set free. {@--4@} To disregard.
